summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Profitcast HR Platform including backend APIs, frontend UI, and integration testing. Login functionality and navigation work correctly. Dark theme styling matches design guide specifications. Some API endpoints experiencing connectivity issues.

api_connectivity.issue: Some API endpoints returning 520 errors when accessed through frontend proxy
api_connectivity.impact: Affects data loading on Attendance and Leave pages

integration_issues.issue: Some pages show loading states due to API 520 errors

details: Proper font families: Rubik for headings, Inter for body text
Profitcast branding and logo properly implemented
Sidebar navigation with correct styling and hover effects
Form elements styled with dark theme colors and proper focus states

passed_tests: All page navigation (Employees, Attendance, Leave, Settings)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix API proxy configuration to resolve 520 errors on some endpoints when accessed through frontend. Backend APIs work correctly when tested directly.
